trans-unit.source: Provides an HTML color string builder at design time that allows a user to select a color.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 HTML 色彩字串產生器設計階段，可讓使用者選取色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ColorBuilder.BuildColor%2A> method starts a user interface for selecting a color value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ColorBuilder.BuildColor%2A>方法會啟動選取的色彩值的使用者介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ColorBuilder.BuildColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ColorBuilder class is not intended for use outside of the design time environment.
trans-unit.target: ColorBuilder 類別不是在設計階段環境外部使用。

trans-unit.source: ColorBuilder requires the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormsBuilderUIService>, which is typically available within a Web Forms project at design time.
trans-unit.target: 需要 ColorBuilder <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormsBuilderUIService>，這是在設計階段通常使用 Web Form 專案中。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormsBuilderUIService>

trans-unit.source: If you want to build HTML color strings, you may want to implement a method that converts the RGB values of a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> object to an HTML-compatible RRGGBB format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要建立 HTML 色彩字串，您可能想要實作的方法，將轉換的 RGB 值<xref:System.Drawing.Color>HTML 相容 RRGGBB 格式字串的物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use a control to select a color or configure a color, you can build a user interface for this, or you may want to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control which allows you to edit <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties with the default <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor> providing a color selection interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用的控制項選取色彩，或設定色彩，您可以建立使用者介面，或您可能想要使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控制項可讓您編輯<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性使用預設<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor>提供色彩選取項目介面。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: Starts a color editor to build an HTML color property value.
trans-unit.target: 啟動 色彩編輯器來建立 HTML 色彩屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The returned string, if other than `null`, indicates a color in a valid HTML color format.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串，如果有其他比`null`，指出有效的 HTML 格式中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Valid formats include named colors and color codes in RGB format (#RRGGBB).
trans-unit.target: 有效格式包含具名的色彩和色彩編碼 RGB 格式 (#RRGGBB)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> whose site is to be used to access design-time services.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>其站台是用來存取設計階段服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> used to parent the picker window.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>用於父選擇器 視窗。

trans-unit.source: The initial color to be shown in the picker window, in a valid HTML color format.
trans-unit.target: 初始色彩中選擇器 視窗中有效的 HTML 格式顯示。

trans-unit.source: The color value, represented as a string in an HTML color format, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the builder service could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 色彩值，表示為字串中的 HTML 格式，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果無法抓取 builder 服務。
